alert.note: Alert for Cass; Northern Berrien; Southern Berrien (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 17 at 9:10AM EST until November 17 at 10:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Cass MI, Northern Berrien and Southern Berrien Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 10 AM EST this morning. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 7 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to slick roads. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling.
